record.description: Phi Delta Theta Fraternity, 1897. Third row, left to right: Knight French Flanders, William Wilson, Earle Crayton Hales, and George Henry Garrey; second row: Carl Howell Sawyer, Robert Emerson Graves, Fred H. G. Calhoun, and Clarkes Francis Stockey; first row: George A. Brayton, Stacy Carroll Mosser, Charles Wanders Chase, Harold LeClair Ickes, and William Everton Ramsey.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
